channel.title: Develop alternative for opengis location information
channel.description: Currently use of opengis is required, but only by virtue of the element being required, and opengis being the only option, we should think of an alternative so we can make the guidance more IATI-like e.g. saying that 'a location service should be indicated to identify the location' rather than effectively forcing opengis

item.title: Develop alternative for opengis location information
item.dc:creator: matmaxgeds
item.description:
Currently use of opengis is required, but only by virtue of the element being required, and opengis being the only option, we should think of an alternative so we can make the guidance more IATI-like e.g. saying that ‘a location service should be indicated to identify the location’ rather than effectively forcing opengis

Read full topic
item.source: Develop alternative for opengis location information
